about_the_game:
Arcadia Issue 006 - July 2021

Welcome to ARCADIA ! Inspired by old-school tabletop magazines, ARCADIA is MCDM's digital magazine for 5th edition GMs and players. We hope you like it!
The Grim Accord by Michael E. Shea with art from Zuzanna Wuzyk. This article gives you four evil adventurer NPCs you can drop right into your game. These mercenaries make perfect rivals for your heroes and fight for gold and each other. Heavens help the party that crosses the Accord.
The Armor of Zevellon by Gabe Hicks with art from Grace Cheung. Each piece of this suit of magic plate armor gives the wearer incredible power. Collect them all to unleash the armor's full power ... and a fiendish surprise. Plus, a short adventure for 6th-level characters is included in the article.
Spelunking by H.H. Carlan with art from Miska Fredman, Faizal Fikiri, and Elisa Serio. This adventure for 4th-level characters has the characters go cave-diving to find a group of missing teens and face dangers unleashed by an ancient crystal monster.
